thread.title: Forza Horizon 5 finds its release date on PS5 and will be optimized for the PS5 PRO - Aroged
thread.title_full: Forza Horizon 5 finds its release date on PS5 and will be optimized for the PS5 PRO - Aroged

author: @Thearoged
title: Forza Horizon 5 finds its release date on PS5 and will be optimized for the PS5 PRO - Aroged
text: It is on April 29, 2025 that Forza Horizon 5 will be available on PlayStation 5, just a year after the portage of Sea of Thieves on this same platform. To honor this event, Microsoft unpacks all the paraphernalia of special editions, early access and even optimization intended for owners of PS5 Pro.
